However/RB ,/, because/IN it/PRP lives/VBD in/IN the/DT ocean/NN and/CC does/VBZ n't/RB need/VB to/TO support/VB its/PRP$ own/JJ weight/NN like/IN land/NNP animals/NNP ,/, the/DT flesh/NN is/VBZ much/RB more/JJ tender/NN than/IN beef/NN ./. Tuna/NNP are/VBP also/RB unique/VB as/IN they/PRP have/VBP the/DT ability/NN to/TO raise/VB their/PRP$ body/JJ temperature/NN above/IN the/DT temperature/NN of/IN the/DT surrounding/JJ water/NN unlike/NN other/JJ fish/NN which/WDT are/VBP strictly/JJ cold/JJ blooded/NN ./. This/DT unique/NN ability/NN is/VBZ precisely/RB what/WP makes/VBZ Tuna/NNP so/RB delicious/JJ ./.
